mealPlans.description: Meal plan designed for individuals aiming to gain weight. High-calorie meals included.
Meal plan designed for individuals aiming to lose weight. Low-calorie, balanced meals included.
Meal plan designed for individuals struggling with obesity. Emphasis on portion control and healthy choices.
Meal plan designed for individuals aiming to maintain their current weight. Balanced meals included.
Meal plan designed for individuals aiming to build muscle mass. High-protein meals included.
Meal plan designed for individuals following a vegan lifestyle. Plant-based, nutrient-rich meals included.
